item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

Rudy’s
372 Elm St
865-1242
Manager - Jeff

Rudy’s is going to extend their happy hour from 6-9 just for us so join us for a drink and some fantastic frites!

$3 pints on managers selections (like Harpoon and others)
$10 pitchers
$2 off LARGE (only) Frites

Contact: Robyn-Allise – 203-823-5302

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Monday Happy Hour at Rudy's
